name: Walk Victoria Guide to over 60 Walks 2nd Edition
categories: Walk Victoria Guide to over 60 Walks 2nd Edit
description: Get some fresh air around Victoria, BC. Follow the directions in this user-friendly guidebook to explore Victoria’s pretty parks and scenic neighbourhoods. Includes Portage Park in View Royal, Glencoe Cove-Kwatsech Park in Gordon Head, the cemetery in Fernwood, Moss Rock in Fairfield, Old Joe’s Trail in Saanich, and more. Maps, trail stats, highlights, and directions to the trailhead accompany the route descriptions.
